data.message:
eminem has greatest fans in the world, they know what
is good music and they don't listen justin gayber.
Everybody want to be good rapper just like Eminem, 
to make good music, to be good singer, to write amazing lyrics.
We can improve our rap skills, so I made fb page where I share some tips 
and vocal exercises that I found and learned from guys who is fucking amazing.
You can share your tips too.
Join my page, we can together learn something new about rapping 
and who knows maybe some of us one day make music with eminem.
'we can get to the top but we can't do that alone' :D
peace :D

https://www.facebook.com/pages/HIP-HOP-writing-tips-and-vocal-exercises/1397066863849086?ref=hl
